posts.message:
An innovative healthcare technology Company is hiring a qualified caliber :

Front End:

Job Requirements: 

• Expert with hand-coding advanced HTML5, CSS3, JS/AJAX techniques.
• Knowledge of CSS frameworks (i.e. Twitter Bootstrap)
• Familiar with CSS preprocessing frameworks.
• Familiar with Visual Studio 2012.
• Keep up to date with the latest tools, techniques and best practices and help introduce new ideas to the team

• JavaScript and UI programming using client-side libraries like jQuery, and KnockoutJs is a plus

Job Description:

• Collaborates with team to create HTML5 page layouts, professional visual appearance, CSS creation and resolve cross browser compatibility issues.
• Creates and contributes to a rich library of robust, reusable components and tools to streamline future development

To Apply Send Your CV at : Christina.saber@drbridge.com

posts.message:
We are looking for a Senior Web Developer to be responsible for developing innovative, reusable Web-based tools for progressive online activism and community building.
Our web developers are capable of full cycle project leadership including application architecture, design input, site layout/user interface, database design/programming, and .NET development.

Required Technical Skills

5+ years of experience in software development utilizing MS Visual Studio 2010/2012 (.Net Framework 3.5/4.0/4.5 C#, VB.NET, ASP.NET, MVC , HTML, AJAX, JavaScript, JQuery, Entity Framework, WCF, Web Services)
5+ years of experience working with MS SQL Server Databases and Stored Procedures (SQL 2005, 2008 or 2012 preferred).
Strong Object Oriented design and development skills.
Strong experience designing and working with n-tier architectures (UI, Business Logic Layer, Data Access Layer) along with some experience with service-oriented architectures (SOA).
Experience with source control tools (TFS/VSS/SVN/Github)
Experience with issue tracking and bug tracking systems
Support day-to-day running of applications.
Experience with Third party controls like Telerik is a plus
Experience with CMS Systems like Dotnetnuke is a plus.
Detail oriented with good communication skills
Follow software development best practices with respect to documentation and configuration management.
Work remotely with development team to build and improve overall product quality.
self-motivated, independent, detail oriented, responsible team-player and exhibit exceptional relationship management skills

Please send you resume to amr.saafan@gmail.com with Subject: SL-WBDV

I did share this before but just in case you missed it.. Hilo is a great starting point if you like to learn how to design build E2E Windows Store application..
Don't forget to read the accompanied book..
